title: Fake Crypto Projects: Spot and Report Scams
description:
First they will reach out to you via Twitter and will offer a signal and project pre-sales with whales. Then will ask you to reach out on @xbauuch on telegram to be added on their private tg and they will offer a pre-sale for public launch. They will ask you to pay @mickey7055 for private ID and minimum Solana for pre-sale, then they will kept increasing the minimum for you to top-up. Once you agreed to not send again for a minimum, they will ask for you to set-up a bot @Basedbot0_bot which should have a tokens to continue the air drop. It requires to sign-up for this bot to receive the token allocation which you have already paid, however, you can't sign up to this bot without inputting your wallet seed phrase.

First they will reach out to you via Twitter and will offer a signal and project pre-sales with whales. Then will ask you to reach out on @xbauuch on telegram to be added on their private tg and they will offer a pre-sale for public launch. They will ask you to pay @mickey7055 for private ID and minimum Solana for pre-sale, then they will kept increasing the minimum for you to top-up. Once you agreed to not send again for a minimum, they will ask for you to set-up a bot @Basedbot0_bot which should have a tokens to continue the air drop. It requires to sign-up for this bot to receive the token allocation which you have already paid, however, you can't sign up to this bot without inputting your wallet seed phrase.

Amount lost

2500.00 USD
